Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Netherworld Lane, heading east to west.
Room.LongDescription: Netherworld Lane ends just west of here at Oceanview Drive, just before the South Nylandian Bay Guard Station. The guard station is positioned near the entrance to Nylandian Bay to prevent pirates and other invasion forces from entering the city. Netherworld Lane continues east towards the center of town.
